Package repository

Interface Repository<E extends Entity<Id>,Id>

All Known Subinterfaces:
AwardedBadgeRepository, BadgeRepository, QuestRepository, UserRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(E e) throws RepositoryException
      Adds an entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      e - - the entitity to be added
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if the entity has already been added

    • delete

      void delete(E e)
      Deletes an entity from the repository.
      Parameters:
      e - - the entity to be removed

    • update

      void update(E e, Id id) throws RepositoryException
      Updates an entity in the repository.
      Parameters:
      e - - the entity to be updated
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if the entitydoes not exist

    • findById

      E findById(Id id)
      Finds an entity in the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID by which to find the entity
      Returns:
      the entity with the given ID

      Iterable<E> getAll()
      Gets all the entities in the repository.
